name: xDai Development Court
description:
**Court purpose** 

 In this court, jurors will solve disputes involving the respect of specifications given by the client.
summary:
**Example** 

 Developper does not respect indentation, does not name variables explicitly or has not made a clear file structure. In such cases, jurors should refuse the proposal made by the developer.
requiredSkills: This court requires a good level of programmation. Jurors who are not intermediate developers are advised to stake into this court only if they have some basics of low-level programming languages, ​​algorithmic and knowledge of good practices of development.
